feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.0.5
entry.content:
• [Huntarr] Recovery Key - If you have 2FA enabled, the 2FA field now works when generating a recovery key
  • [Huntarr] Version Display - Now integrates version into database and then displays what's from the database
  • [Huntarr] Apps Test Button - Is now gone. When you place your URL & API, it will automatically test connect

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/8.0.4...8.0.5

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.0.6
entry.content: • [Lidarr] FIxed request - Unable to save # numbers for upgrade and missing which now fixed.

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.0.7
entry.content: • To assist windows users to prevent database issues - Request (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/629)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.0.9
entry.content:
• [Sonarr] Each instance can now use itâ€™s own mode instead of being a global setting (useful for doing season packs and epsodie mode)
  • [Sonarr] Patched glitch when you hit add instance, it would add two instead of one
  • [Huntarr] Unable to change user name (patched)
  • [Huntarr] Unable to change password (patched)
  • [Huntarr] Removed some redudant logs
  • [Huntarr] Removed excessive space for the login page for the Plex Login Button
  • [Plex] If not setup, it hides it on the logon page
  • [Plex] Fixed where you can now properly logon (database conversion)
  • [Plex] User page now shows linked at date/time stamp again
